channel.title: Vaporizer on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in Vaporizer on Joost Plattel

item.title: Cooking up and getting down in Chemistry
item.description: I made a small visit to Paris at the start of November and I had the opportunity to visit the Lab Store. I've read about the concept in a book called The Lab that I've bought during my first visit to San Francisco. It's just pure luck that I come across that book in a little bookstore, but it feels like the adventure is just about to start.. While visiting the Lab Store I had to buy one of the Le Whaf's.
